text:
*Help Needed:* Whats the easiest way to lookup all contact properties of a list of contact ids? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
*`/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/read`* 
*Looks like the most efficiant… but it seems to require you list out all the contact properties you want…. when we really want … all properties.*
